properties.entry: SELECT POST_TITLE, MEMBER_NIC, CREATE_DATE, TIME, DIFFICULTY, MAIN_INGRE FROM RECIPE R JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'N' AND R.STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, POST_NO DESC

SELECT POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_NIC, CREATE_DATE, TIME, DIFFICULTY, MAIN_INGRE, SUB_INGRE FROM CAMP_REVIEW C JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE POST_NO = ? AND M.STATUS = 'N' AND C.STATUS = 'N'
INSERT INTO RECIPE ( BOARD_NO, POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, TIME, DIFFICULTY, MAIN_INGRE, SUB_INGRE ) VALUES ( 7, SEQ_RECNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE RECIPE SET POST_TITLE = ?, POST_CONTENT = ? TIME = ? DIFFICULTY = ? MAIN_INGRE = ? SUB_INGRE = ? WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE RECIPE SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE POST_NO = ?
